metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6612 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An integer underflow bug in the process_EXIF function of the exif.c file of jhead 3.00 raises a heap-based buffer over-read when processing a malicious JPEG file, which may allow a remote attacker to cause a denial-of-service attack or unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: jhead: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
